name: Rocket Re Entry
description: Our game is Rocket Re Entry. Where-in you pilot a space capsule that is currently in orbit around the Earth.You have to make your re entry burn, to safely enter the atmosphere but, you have to be careful to not burn too long or you'll burn-up. If you don't burn long enough you'll bounce off into space. Once you make it into the atmosphere, you have to land the capsule at Kennedy Space Center, try not to miss the landing area or you might end up somewhere else in Florida all together.
